channel.title: Need help with adding range animation!
channel.description:
Ok i'm using richscape v5 and I just made ogre comp bow the dark bow, but when I attack someone in the wild it shows me punching the guy.......HELP??? It doesn't even damage him!!
I know I need to edit the animation/create it, but how???
